definition: dermis (layer within the skin containing sense of touch)

sentences.english: The subdermal vascular network is very important for the skin graft survival.
sentences.chinese: 帶真皮下血管網對皮片成活可能起重要作用。

sentences.english: A fissure is a linear cleft through the epidermis, or into the dermis.
sentences.chinese: 裂隙是穿過表皮或深達真皮的線狀損害。

sentences.english: Along with the clinical improvement the spongiform pustules vanished, and the inflammation in dermis also lessened.
sentences.chinese: 治療後表皮內海綿狀膿皰消失，真皮炎症有所減輕。

sentences.english: Hair grows from deep within hair follicles , which are thin cavities embedded in the dermis.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮生長的毛囊深處，這是薄腔中嵌入真皮。

sentences.english: Transplantation of skin with intact subdermal vascular plexus is a new type of skin graft.
sentences.chinese: 帶真皮下血管網皮膚遊離移植是一種新的植皮術。

sentences.english: The vasculature of the dermis is particularly well developed at sites of adnexal structures.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚附屬器部的真皮脈管尤其發達。

sentences.english: An all-leather sofa affords you the latest amenities and convenience.
sentences.chinese: 全真皮沙發，給您最現代的舒適與方便。

sentences.english: Collagen is the main ingredient of skin corium 72%.
sentences.chinese: 膠原蛋白是人體皮膚真皮層中的主要成分，佔72%。

sentences.english: The sofa is made of genuine leather.
Under this lies the dermis consisting of connective tissue.
sentences.chinese: 在這個謊言的真皮組成的結締組織。

sentences.english: Compare this real leather with that imitated leather.
sentences.chinese: 把這塊真皮和那塊仿皮比較一下。

sentences.english: There is also an histological loss or decrease of the number in elastic fibers in the papillary dermis.
sentences.chinese: 病理特徵爲乳突真皮區之彈性纖維缺失或數目減少。

sentences.english: The "perfect" microdermabrasion is performed within the shallow dermis in order to achieve the effect of regenerative repair.
sentences.chinese: 磨皮是在淺層真皮層，如此才能達到再生修補的療效。

sentences.english: Available in genuine leather , half leather and fabric upholstery.
sentences.chinese: 椅座及椅背可選配全真皮，半真皮及顏色布料覆蓋。

sentences.english: Available in genuine leather , half leather and fabric upholstery.
sentences.chinese: 椅座及椅背可選配全真皮，半真皮及顏色布料覆蓋。

sentences.english: The pathological examination showed that the mucin deposited between the collagen bundles in the superfical and mid dermis.
sentences.chinese: 病理檢查顯示真皮中上部膠原纖維束間有粘蛋白沉積。

definition: outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
